name: Lala :)
wishText: Happy Birthday to someone who’s twice as sweet as any birthday cake. May Allah's ﷻ goodness and mercy shine upon you today and in the many years to come. I have no better gift to give you on this special day than my heartfelt prayers and sincere wishes. May Allah ﷻ grant you good health and abundant sustenance as you grow in age! ;)  امين
